content.text:
# Draft:Krishna Swaroop Vaish

Krishna Swaroop Vaish was a social worker, an advocate, an Indian politician, and a member of the Uttar Pradesh Assembly, Uttar Pradesh, India. He represented the Badaun (Assembly constituency) several times (between 1969 and 1995) in the Budaun district of Uttar Pradesh.
References
https://www.livehindustan.com/uttar-pradesh/badaun/story-krishna-swaroop-vaish-became-a-minister-in-kalyan-singh-39-s-government-4425880.html
